stick.desc: Used to craft many other items

wooden_pickaxe.desc: Reduces ore timers by 5%. Does not stack with other wooden pickaxes

wooden_axe.desc: Reduces tree timers by 5%. Does not stack with other wooden axes

wooden_hoe.desc: Reduces crop timers by 5%. Does not stack with other wooden hoes

stone_axe.desc: Reduces tree timers by 10%. Does not stack with other stone axes

stone_pickaxe.desc: Reduces ore timers by 10%. Does not stack with other stone pickaxes

stone_hoe.desc: Reduces crop timers by 10%. Does not stack with other stone hoes
